'*' matches zero or more characters ('run*' matches 'run', 'runs', and'running', etc.) '?' matches exactly one character ('run?' matches 'runs' and 'rung', but not 'run' or 'running').
'*' al rod zero ou plizier karakter ('mam*' pou al rod 'mam', 'mama', 'mamzel', 'mamlouk', etc.) '?' al rod exakteman enn sel karakter ('mam?' pou al rod 'mama' ek 'mame', me pa 'mam' ou 'mamzel').

--ITokenizer=<classname> --ITokenizerTarget=<classname> Source- or target-language tokenizer to use (overrides project settings).
--ITokenizer=<classname> --ITokenizerTarget=<classname> Tokenizer lang sours ou sib ki pou servi (ranplas bann paramet proze).

--disable-project-locking Pa sey verouy file proze omegat.project.
--mode=[console-translate|console-pseudotranslatetmx|console-align] Specify a mode other than default (GUI).
--mode=[console-translate|console-pseudotranslatetmx|console-align] Swazir enn lot mod ki mod par defo (setadir interfas itilizater).
--pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty] What to fill the pseudotranslated TMX with.
--pseudotranslatetype=[equal|empty] Konteni pou inklir dan TMX ki pou psedotradi.

--remote-project Telesarz enn file omegat.project depi URL mansione dan <project path> ek load proze-la.

--resource-bundle=<path> Enn file .properties Java pou bann text interfas itilizater --config-dir=<path> Dosie pou lir/ekrir bann file konfigirasion OmegaT.
--script=<path> A script file to be executed on project events.
--script=<path> Enn file skript ki pou exekite kan ena bann evennman dan proze.

<i1>Ou kapav instal OmegaT lor ninport ki operating system ki kapav zer Java runtime environment version 1.6.</i1>
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is a free translation memory application that works on Windows, macOS, Linux...
<s0>OmegaT</s0> li enn program lib memwar tradiksion ki fonksionn lor Windows, macOS, Linux...
<s0>OmegaT</s0> is available in many different versions in order to suit a range of user requirements.
<s0>OmegaT</s0> disponib dan diferan version pou satisfer diferan profil itilizater.
<s1>The benefit</s1>: once launched, future updates of the Web Start version will be installed automatically on your computer.<br2/>

<s3>Dezavantaz</s3>: ou pa kapav servi plugins pou lemoman, setadir pa tou bann fonksion ki pou disponib.

Kapav telesarz <u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> dan preske 100 lang. Li kapav servi kouma enn fondman pou enn gloser informatik.

A comprehensive suite of utilities for preparing files for translation in a CAT tool.

Enn karakter ki pa enn nimero: [^0-9]

A vast range of functions, an uncluttered interface, and, most importantly, constant, regular open-source development!

As elsewhere in the OmegaT project, the work of programming OmegaT is done by volunteers, and in keeping with the project philosophy, the developments and improvements they make to OmegaT are ultimately at their discretion.
Kouma le res proze OmegaT, travay programasion OmegaT li fer par bann volonter. An-akor ek filozofi proze-la, bann devlopman ek ameliorasion zot aport OmegaT depann lor zot.
As entries can mix words from priority and non priority glossaries, the words from the priority glossary are displayed in bold.

As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.
Etan done ki konteni existan pa pou modifie, pa pou ena erer dan file existan.
As with free developments, however, the principle still applies that any changes to OmegaT must be beneficial to the application and its users.

OmegaT li pa selman enn program; li ousi enn proze pasionan ki ou kapav zwen.

OmegaT nepli ena ase memwar pou fonksione, ek pou ferme kan ou pou apiy lor OK.
OmegaT videos on the Qabiria YouTube channel.
Video OmegaT lor lasenn YouTube Qabiria.
OmegaT will run on any system on which the appropriate JRE (Java Runtime Environment) has been or can be installed.
OmegaT pou marse lor ninport ki sistem kot JRE (Java Runtime Environment) apropriye finn instale ouswa kapav instale.
OmegaT will then omit the corresponding files when loading projects, and will copy them unmodified to the target folder when creating target documents.
OmegaT pa pou pran kont bann file korespondan kan li load proze-la ek pou kopie zot direk dan dosie sib, san modifikasion, letan kreasion bann dokiman sib.
OmegaT will usually run on any Linux system on which a suitable version of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) can be be installed.
OmegaT pou marse lor ninport ki sistem Linux kot enn version apropriye Java Runtime Environment (JRE) finn instale.
OmegaT's developers, who are all volunteers, may be more willing to implement an RFE if the development work is funded by the requester.
Etan done ki bann devloper OmegaT zot tou benevol, enn RFE ki finanse par dimounn ou lantite ki bizin sa fonksion-la li ena plis sans inplemante.
On the Mac, the modifier <e0>meta</e0> must be used to specify the <e1>command</e1> key.
Lor Mac, bizin servi modifikater <e0>meta</e0> pou definir tous <e1>command</e1>.
Once a user has formulated a proposed change or enhancement to OmegaT, a defined procedure exists for its submission to the development team for consideration.
Sak sigzestion modifikasion ou ameliorasion OmegaT par enn itilizater pas par enn prosedir lexamin par lekip devlopman.
Once the <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> file is modified, <a1>OmegaT</a1> must be relaunched to take the new shortcuts into account.
Enn fwa ki file <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> finn sanze, bizin restart <a1>OmegaT</a1> pou pran kont bann nouvo shortcut.
One of the most useful things OmegaT users can do is... to use OmegaT.
Pli gran servis ki bann itilizater OmegaT kapav rann se... itiliz OmegaT.
One or more of the above problems may have been fixed, but the project has not been reloaded.
Enn ouswa plizier problem mansione laho finn resoud, me proze-la pa finn reload.
One reason for this is that the desired function may already have been implemented, or that there may be reasons why it cannot be implemented.
An-efe, fonksion swete kapav li deza existe, ouswa kapav ena bann rezon kifer pa kapav met li an pratik.
Online repositories of spelling dictionaries for use within OmegaT.
Repertwar bann diksioner lortograf ki kapav itilize avek OmegaT
Only if they are considered beneficial for OmegaT's users, however, will the development team include them in OmegaT.
Toutfwa zot pou integre selman si zot konsidere kouma benefik pou bann itilizater OmegaT par bann manb lekip devlopman.
Options: None: Launch GUI Project path only: Launch GUI and load specified project team Team project tool.
Opsion: None: Lans interfas itilizater Project path only: Lans interfas itilizater ek load proze mansione-la team Zouti pou bann proze lekip.
Original author of the OmegaT application
Other users are advised to use the <a0>Okapi Filters Plugin</a0> instead.
Bann lezot itilizater plito ankouraze servi <a0>Plug-in Filt Okapi</a0> anplas.
Page slips through fingers Pulse pounding hard and frantic Vanishing like mist
Sa paz-la finn emansipe Li bien-bien lwin zordi... Erer 404
Period, followed by an upper-case letter - possibly a space is missing between the period and the start of a new sentence?
Pwin, swivi par enn maziskil li posib ki enn lespas manke ant enn pwin ek enn nouvo fraz.
Place source files in ./source and supplemental material in ./tm, ./glossary, and ./dictionary as required, then commit everything.
Met bann file sours dan ./source ek bann materyel siplemanter dan ./tm, ./glossary, ek ./dictionary respektivman, ek commit lansanb.
Place the dictionary files you wish to use in this folder.
Met file diksioner ki ou oule servi dan sa dosie-la.
Please consult the documentation about your recovery options and return the information below to the software manufacturer with a description of how this error was produced.
Get dokimantasion pou bann posibilite rekiperasion ek avoy linformasion anba la bann devloper OmegaT avek anplis enn deskripsion lor seki finn prodwir sa erer-la.
Please contact the <a0>OmegaT Localization Co-ordinator</a0> for details of what is involved in localizing/translating OmegaT.
Pran kontak avek <a0>koordinater lokalizasion OmegaT</a0> pou konn tou bann detay lor tradiksion/lokalizasion OmegaT.
Please contact the <a0>OmegaT project manager</a0> regarding any point not covered above.
Pran kontak avek <a0>koordinater proze OmegaT</a0> pou ninport ki pwin ki pa finn aborde laho.
Please contact the <a3>webmaster</a3> for any point regarding specifically the website.
Pran kontak avek <a3>webmaster</a3> pou ninport ki pwin lor sit Internet.
Please correct the tag issues before using again Create Translated Documents.
Koriz bann erer tag avan ou reservi "Kree bann Dokiman Tradi" silvouple.
Please do not use these tracking systems before first raising the issue on the user group and/or mailing lists.
Silvouple napa servi sa bann sistem swivi-la avan diskit problem-la lor group itilizater ouswa dan bann mailing lists.
Please select the language of your source files and the target language you would like to translate to.
Swazir lang ou bann file sours ek lang sib ou oule tradir.
Please type or paste the URL of the mediawiki page
Tap ouswa kol URL paz MediaWiki la
Pre-built binaries, are available as Nightly Builds.
Bann pre-built binaries disponib sou form Nightly Builds.
Pre-defined themes can be set using scripts.
Ou kapav definir enn tem gras-a enn skript.
Private collections are displayed in bold.
Bann koleksion prive montre an gra.
Problem letan pe load file proze-la!
Problem: In the glossary pane, some characters are not displayed properly
Problem: Dan vole Gloser, detrwa karakter pas bien afise
Problem: No glossary terms are displayed - possible causes:
Problem: Okenn term gloser pe afise. Lakoz posib:
Procedure for using OmegaT to localize Magento.
Prosedir pou servi OmegaT pou lokaliz Magento (Angle).
Procedure for using OmegaT to localize XLIFF files exported from Wordpress.
Prosedir pou servi OmegaT pou lokaliz bann file XLIFF ki finn exporte depi Wordpress.
Procedure for using OmegaT to localize the NetBeans IDE.
Prosedir pou servi OmegaT pou lokaliz NetBeans IDE (Angle).
Programming is certainly the most important function, and without programming, there is no program.
Programasion, li vre, li fonksion ki pli inportan, ek san programasion, pa ti pou ena program.
Ou proze vid ouswa okenn file finn rekonet par OmegaT.
Project searches are by default performed on the source and target, reference TMs, glossaries, notes and comments of the project.
Bann resers proze zot par defo dan bann dokiman sours ek sib, memwar tradiksion de referans, gloser, not ek komanter dan proze-la.
Provides filters for handling further file formats, including Trados TTX.
Fourni bann filt pou zer bann lezot format file, kouma Trados TTX
Rather than beep Or a rude error message These words: 'Page not found'
San okenn tapaz Zis enn mesaz... Erer 404
Regex - Classes for Unicode blocks and categories
Regex Klas pou kategori ek blok Unicode
Regex - Examples of regular expressions in translations
Regex Exanp expresion regilie dan tradiksion
Regex tools and examples of use
Definir an tan ki tradiksion idantik
Regular expression searches match Java regular expressions as documented in the user manual.
Enn resers par expresion regilie pou pran kont bann expresion regilie Java (get gid litilizasion pou bann detay).
Remove all text except tags, or all tags except text
Siprim tou bann text exsepte bann tag, ouswa siprim tou bann tag exsepte bann texte
Replace &glossary hits when inserting source text
Ranplas bann lantre &gloser letan insert text sours
Replace glossary hits when inserting source text
Inklir bann lantre gloser kan text sours insere
Requires Linux, w3m and tcl/tk (both generally supplied with Linux).
Nesesit Linux, w3m ek tcl/tk (toule-de normalman instale avek Linux).
Restores the components of the main OmegaT window to their default state.
Rann bann konpozan lafnet prinsipal OmegaT zot laspe par defo.
Right-click in the glossary pane or press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> to add a new entry.
Right-click dan vole Gloser ouswa fer <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> pou azout enn nouvo lantre.
Right-clicking on an underlined word (Artund in the figure above) opens a drop-down menu listing suggestions for the correction (Art und).
Enn "right-click" lor enn mo souligne (Artund dan ilistrasion laho la) pou ouver enn meni avek enn lalis sigzestion pou so koreksion (Art und).
Save then the file and relaunch <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Scope: The scope of a search is by default the project and can be set to be any files located in a specified folder hierarchy.
Porte: Par defo, porte resers li lor lansanb proze, me kapav konfigir li lor ninport ki file dan enn striktir dosie defini.
Script for extracting text for translation from plain-text files (e.g. computer source code) for translation in OmegaT.
Skript pou extrer text depi enn file plain-text (ex. enn kod informatik) pou tradiksion dan OmegaT.
Scripts/procedures are available to enable you to do the following:
Ou kapav servi sa bann skript/prosedir-la pou:
Search for the required language combination - for instance on the <u0>dictionary links given by the OmegaT Wiki</u0>.
Sers konbinezon lang ki bizin get par exanp <u0>bann lien diksioner ki ena lor Wiki OmegaT</u0>
See <u0>The Regex Coach</u0> for Windows,Linux, FreeBSD versions of a stand-alone tool.
Get <u0>The Regex Coach</u0> pou enn zouti otonom ki fonksionn dan Windows, Linux ek FreeBSD.
See Help > User's Manual for more information.
Get Asistans > Gid Itilizater pou plis linformasion.
Get dan OmegaT.jar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF pou bann valer ki posib.
See additional references and examples below.
Get plis referans ek lexanp anba.
Select a supplier from the list and, if necessary, click <g0>Configure</g0> to enter the identification details provided by the supplier.
Swazir enn servis dan lalis ek, si neseser, klik lor <g0>Konfigire</g0> pou met ou bann detay idantifikasion sa servis-la.
Select this option if you want dictionaries to display words that have the same root.
Swazir sa lopsion-la si ou oule ki diksioner montre bann mo ki ena mem rasinn
Select this option if you want the glossary to display words that have the same root.
Swazir sa lopsion-la si ou oule ki gloser montre bann mo ki ena mem rasinn
Select whether to download OmegaT with or without the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) included.
Ou kapav telesarz OmegaT avek ou san Java Runtime Environment (JRE).
Selection of alternative icons for use with OmegaT.
Enn seri icon alternatif pou OmegaT.
Self-paced online training course in English (for purchase)
Definir an tan ki tradiksion vid
Sets the segment validation key to Tab instead of the default Enter.
Definir Tab kouma tous validasion enn segman olie Enter (tous par defo).
Should you need more specific information, consult the <u0>Java Regex documentation</u0>.
Si ou bizin linformasion spesifik, get <u0>dokimantasion Java Regex</u0>.
Shows the dialog to modify the text display font.
Montre bwat dialog pou sanz font afisaz text.
Simultaneous use of multiple translation memories
Since the project's inception, it has received the support of dozens of other contributors, too numerous to mention here, but for whose help we are very grateful.
Depi so koumansman, proze-la finn gagn soutien boukou lezot kontribier, tro boukou pou kapav sit zot tou isi. Toutfwa, nou bien-bien rekonesan pou zot led.
Skip segments containing a certain set of characters
Sot bann segman kot ena enn sertin kantite karakter
Some of the dictionaries have no strings attached - i.e. are "Free to use", and others, like the selection above, are under the GPL license.
Sertin diksioner aksesib san kondision (setadir zot 'lib') alor ki lezot (kouma seleksion lao la) soumi lisans GPL/GNU.
Some project folders seem to have been moved.
Koumadir sertin dosie proze finn deplase.
Source files folder entered does not exist!
Dosie mansione pou bann file sours pa existe!

tuv.seg: Strings can be enclosed by quotes ", which allows having a comma inside a string:
Bann lasen karakter kapav koumans ek fini par apostrof ", seki vedir kapav met virgil dan linteryer lasen karakter:
Such auxiliary code has already been written in Javascript, Groovy and Tcl/Tk, for instance.
Par exanp, boukou program finn ekrir dan Javascript, Groovy ek Tcl/Tk.
Pas par tou bann posibilite (maziskil, miniskil, 1e let, etc.)
Met selman 1e let fraz an maziskil
Met 1e let tou bann mo dan seleksion an maziskil
TBX - Term Base eXchange - is the open, XML-based standard for exchanging structured terminological data, TBX has been approved as an international standard by LISA and ISO.
TBX Term Base eXchange li enn standard lib, baze lor XML, ki itilize pou esanz data terminolozik striktire. TBX finn aprouve antan ki norm internasional par LISA ek ISO.
TMX files of localizations of the OmegaT documentation and of this site, for use by localizers.
Bann file TMX pou lokalizasion dokimantasion ek site web OmegaT. Zot destine bann lokalizater.
Terms in the current segment which <a2>OmegaT</a2> finds in the glossary file(s) are displayed in the Glossary pane:
Bann term depi segman an kour ki <a2>OmegaT</a2> trouve dan file gloser-la pou montre dan vole Gloser:
Text Replace: The scope of a text replacement is the target segments of the project, whether they already have contents or not.
Ranplasman: Porte bann ranplasman li lor bann segman sib proze, mem si zot pa ankor tradi.
Thanks to the work of translators in the past, OmegaT's user interface and/or Help texts have been translated into several languages.
Gras-a travay boukou tradikter, linterfas itilizater ek text lasistans OmegaT finn deza tradi dan plizier lang.
That means that if you feel so inclined, you may modify OmegaT to suit your own requirements.
Savedir ki si ou oule, ou kapav modifie OmegaT pou fer li koresponn exakteman kouma seki ou bizin.
That means that users like you are free to download and use it with very little in the way of restrictions.
Savedir ki bann itilizater kouma oumem kapav telesarz li ek servi li san okenn restriksion.
That means there are only a few thousand left!
Savedir ki res ankor enn detrwa mil pou fer!
The "Standard" version of OmegaT includes a full user manual (at least in English) and will usually have been tested for some time to eliminate any bugs.
Version "standard" OmegaT konpran enn gid litilizasion konplet (omwin an Angle). Li finn teste pou siprim tou bann bug.
The "batteries included" version of OmegaT, with its own Java Runtime Environment.
Version OmegaT "avek batri", setadir avek so prop Java Runtime Environment.
The "master" version is a cutting-edge, "alpha" version, still in development.
Li enn "master" version ki ankor an version "alpha", setadir ki son devlopman pe kontigne.
The HTML user manual for OmegaT standard version.
Gid itilizater HTML pou versin standar OmegaT.
The JRE is now supplied with OmegaT and need not be obtained separately.
Etan done ki JRE fourni avek OmegaT, ou pa bizin telesarz ek instal li apar.
The Latest version will usually be reasonably stable and usable, but may have some bugs.
Normalman dernie version pou relativman stab ek itilizab, me li kapav ena detrwa bug.
The OmegaT project is maintained by an informal, international group of volunteers.
Proze OmegaT li existe gras-a enn group informel ek internasional benevol.
The OmegaT project would benefit from greater support from volunteers in almost all areas.
Proze OmegaT li ti pou tir profi enn pli gran soutien bann benevol dan tou bann domenn.
The Web Start version is the "install and forget" version.<br0/>
Version Web Start li enn version "Instale apre bliye".<br0/>
The character with octal value 0mnn (0 <= m <= 3, 0 <= n <= 7)
Karakter ki ena valer oktal 0mnn (0 <= m <= 3, 0 <= n <= 7)
The character with octal value 0n (0 <= n <= 7)
Karakter ki ena valer oktal 0n (0 <= n <= 7)
The character with octal value 0nn (0 <= n <= 7)
Karakter ki ena valer oktal 0nn (0 <= n <= 7)
The character x, except the following...
Karakter x, exsepte pou seki suiv...
The collections are downloaded as TBX glossaries and stored in the current glossary folder.
Bann koleksion-la zot telesarze antan ki gloser TBX ek zot anrezistre dan dosie gloser proze-la.
The contents of glossary files are kept in memory and are loaded when the project is opened or reloaded.
Konteni file gloser li garde dan memwar ek li load kan ouver ou reload proze.
The contents of the glossary pane will be updated accordingly.
Konteni vole Gloser-la pou aktialize en fonksion.
The control character corresponding to x
Karakter kontrol ki koresponn avek x
The default OmegaT shortcuts are available from Sourceforge: <u0>Default OmegaT Shortcuts</u0>
Shortcut OmegaT par defo disponib lor Sourceforge: <u0>Shortcut OmegaT par defo</u0>
The default OmegaT shortcuts for the Mac are also available from Sourceforge, they all use "meta" instead of "ctrl": <u0>Default OmegaT Shortcuts for the Mac</u0>
Shortcut OmegaT par defo lor Mac ousi disponib lor Sourceforge, zot tou servi "meta" dan plas "ctrl": <u0>Shortcut OmegaT par defo pou Mac</u0>
The dialog allows you to enable or disable the following options:
Bwat dialog-la permet ou aktiv ouswa dezaktiv bann lopsion swivan:
The encoding of glossaries is determined automatically.
The extension must be <f0>.txt</f0> or <f1>.utf8</f1> (if not, it will be added).
So lextansion bizin <f0>.txt</f0> ouswa <f1>.utf8</f1> (sinon li pou insere otomatikman).
The file does not need to exist when setting it, it will be created (if necessary) when adding a glossary entry.
Fisie-la pa bizin existe letan konfigirasion, li pou kree (si neseser) kan azout premie lantre dan gloser.
The files of this site, in a convenient package for those wishing to localize it.
Bann file sa sit-la dan enn version pou sa bann ki oule lokaliz li.
The filters used by the current project are displayed in bold.
Bann filt ki pe itilize par proze an kour zot montre an karakter gra.
The first is the shortcut for <g0>Open Project</g0>, the second for <g1>Create Glossary Entry</g1>.
Premie-la shortcut pou <g0>Open Project</g0>, deziem-la pou <g1>Create Glossary Entry</g1>.
The first of these is the <a0>OmegaT user group</a0>.
The following example shows Merriam Webster 10th dictionary "in action":
Sa lexanp-la montre diksioner Merriam Webster 10th an aksion:
The following list includes expressions you may find useful when searching through the translation memory:
Bann expresion dan lalis swivan kapav itil si ou fer enn resers dan memwar tradiksion:
The following tutorials are available online/for download:
Bann tutorials swivan disponib online ouswa par telesarzman:
The full syntax for keystrokes (shortcuts) is defined in the following Java 1.6 documentation from Oracle (bottom of page): <u0>Java 1.6 keystrokes shortcuts</u0>
Sintax konplet pou bann tous (shortcut) presise dan dokimantasion Java 1.6 edite par Oracle (anba paz): <u0>Java 1.6 keystrokes shortcuts</u0>
The glossary file does not have the correct encoding.
Fisie gloser pena enn ankodaz korek.
The glossary file does not have the correct extension (.tab, .utf8 or .txt).
Fisie gloser pa ena bon lextension (.tab, .utf8 ouswa .txt).
The glossary function only finds exact matches with the glossary entry (e.g. does not find inflected forms etc.).
Fonksion gloser trouv zis bann mo ki koresponn exakteman avek bann lantre gloser (ex. li pa rekonet bann form konzige).
The great majority of work on the OmegaT project has been completed on a voluntary basis.
Enn gran kantite travay dan proze OmegaT finn fer lor enn baz benevol.
The help page you seek Lies beyond our perception But others await
Paz asistans ki ou pe rode la manke Me boukou bann lezot pe atann ou... Erer 404
The included JRE is the 64-bit version.
Version JRE ki finn integre li 64-bit.
The items are not separated with a TAB character.
Bann eleman pa separe par karakter TAB.
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).
Kod lang bizin dan format xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY ouswa xxx_YY, kot xx ou xxx kod lang, ek YY kod rezion ouswa pei (opsionel).
The location of the <f0>.tbx</f0> file must be within the <f1>/glossary</f1> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f2>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f2>).
Fisie <f0>.tbx</f0> la bizin dan dosie <f1>/glossary</f1>, me li kapav dan enn sou dosie (ex.: <f2>glossary/sub/MyGlossary.tbx</f2>).
The location of the file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
Fisie-la bizin dan dosie <f2>/glossary</f2>, me il kapav dan enn sou dosie (ex.: <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
The location of the writable glossary file can be set in the <g0>Project > Properties ... </g0>dialog.
Kapav sanz lanplasman file gloser modifiab-la dan dialog <g0>Proze > Propriyete... </g0>.
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
Nom bann file bizin koresponn avek kod lang ou lang sib tel ki li defini dan bwat dialog propriyete proze (<g0>Proze > Propriyete</g0>).
The perfect companion for those of us who don't need complexity but efficiency; glossaries, auto-complete and automatic translation makes my work in literary translation so much more efficient
Enn konpagnon ideal pou nou tou ki pa bizin konplexite me lefikasite; bann gloser, auto-complete ek tradiksion otomatik rann mwa pli prodiktif pou mo bann tradiksion literer.
The philosophy of the project is described <a0>here</a0>.
The possible keyevents (keys) are listed in the following Java 1.6 documentation from Oracle: <u0>Java 1.6 keyEvents description</u0>
Bann evennman tous (keyevents) posib liste dan dokimantasion Java 1.6 edite par Oracle: <u0>Java 1.6 keyEvents description</u0>
The principal members of the project are:
The procedure is termed an <a0>"RFE" (Request for Feature Enhancement) and is managed here</a0>.
Sa prosedir-la apel <a0>"RFE" (Request for Feature Enhancement) ek li zere isi</a0>.
The procedures for configuring access to the Microsoft Translator and Google Translate services are described <u0>here</u0>.
Bann prosedir pou konfigir lakse Microsoft Translator ek Google Translate zot presize <u0>isi</u0>.
The program will seek confirmation before closing down.
Program-la pou touzour demann enn konfirmasion avan li ferme.
The project setting allows one to enter a name for a writable glossary file (see beginning of this chapter).
Ou kapav done enn nom file gloser ki modifiab dan paramet proze (get depi koumansman sa sapit-la).
Lextansion ki program-la rekonet se <f1>TXT</f1> avek <f2>UTF8</f2>
The regular expressions (or regex for short) used in searches and segmentation rules are those supported by Java.
Bann expresion regilie (ou regex) itilize pou bann resers ek dan reg segmantasion zot bann expresion ki itilize par Java.
The results from the priority glossary (by default, glossary/glossary.txt) appear in first places in the Glossary pane and in TransTips.
Rezilta gloser prioriter (glossary/glossary.txt) aparet an premie dan vole Gloser ek dan TransTips.
The same spirit can be found within the OmegaT project.
Proze OmegaT li ankre dan mem lespri.
The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
Bann lang seleksione pou instale ek pou aparet dan lafnet konfigirasion verifikater lortograf (li kapav pran inpe letan).
The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line.
Fisie definision shortcut bizin apel <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0>, ek bizin ena maximum enn definision shortcut par lalign.

The shortcut definition syntax is the following: <c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>, where <e1><menu item code></e1> is a code taken from the tables below and <e2><shortcut></e2> is a combination of pressed keys specified by the user

Sintax pou ekrir enn definision shortcut li: <c0><kod litem meni>=<shortcut></c0>, kot <e1><kod litem meni></e1> li enn kod ki trouv dan bann tablo anba-la ek <e2><shortcut></e2> li enn konbinezon ki ou finn spesifie
The source file language entered is invalid!
The source term does not have to be a single-word item, as the next example shows:
Term sours-la pa neseserman enn sel mo, kouma dan sa lexanp-la:

The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.

Verifikater lortograf servi kod lang sib pou determnn ki lang pou itilize: si lang sib li Portige Brezilien (PT_BR), sou dosie ki kontenir bann leksik bizin ena de file ki apel <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> ek <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.
The third column can be used for additional information.
Trwaziem kolonn-la li kapav itilize pou lezot linformasion.
The translated file language entered is invalid!

tuv.seg: The underlined item "pop-up menu" can be found in the glossary pane as "pojavni menu".
Kapav trouv item souligne "pop-up menu" dan vole Gloser kouma "pojavni menu".
The user manual for OmegaT in PDF format ({{ site.data.versions.standard.name }}).
Gid itilizater OmegaT an format PDF ({{ site.data.versions.standard.name }}).
The version for installation by the user, familiar to existing OmegaT users.
Instalasion par itilizater. Li lopsion abitiel bann itilizater regilie OmegaT.
The vocabulary entry can have a comment added.
Enn lantre vokabiler kapav ena enn (ou plizier) komanter.
The word before the = sign is the source term, and its translation is (or are) the words after =.
Bann mo avan sign =, zot bann term sours. Bann mo apre sign =, zot bann tradiksion.
The writeable glossary file must be inside the glossary folder
File gloser ekrivab bizin dan dosie pou bann gloser
There are essentially two ways in which you can do this.
Ena prinsipalman de fason ou kapav fer sa.
There are no terms in the current segment which match any terms in the glossary.
Okenn term dan segman an kour match enn term dan gloser.
There is however considerable scope within the project for users to suggest improvements and influence the course of future development.
Ena toutfwa plizier fason bann itilizater kapav sigzer bann ameliorasion ek inflians fitir devlopman proze-la.
There is no EXACT match between the glossary entry and the source text in your document - for instance plurals.
Pa ena enn EXACT match ant lantre gloser ek text sours dan ou dokiman (par exanp, diferans singilie/pliryel).
There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project.
Li pa neseser dir OmegaT ki diksioner bizin servi; program-la pou itiliz diksioner apropriye an fonksion kod lang ou proze.
There should be three files, with extensions <e1>dz, idx </e1>and <e2>ifo</e2>.
Pou ena trwa file avek lextansion <e1>dz, idx </e1>ek <e2>ifo</e2>.
These three are certain: Death, taxes, and page not found You, victim of one
Ena de kiksoz ki sertin: Lamor, ek sa paz-la manke... Erer 404
These utilities enable OmegaT to be used to translate file formats for which XLIFF conversion filters are available.
Sa bann utilities-la permet ou servi OmegaT pou tradir bann format file kot bann filt konversion XLIFF deza existe.

They generally follow much the same pattern (for an example from the Regular Expression Tester see below): the regular expression (top entry) analyzes the search text (Text box in the middle) , yielding the hits, shown in the result Text box.

Zot tou normalman parey (get anba pou enn lexanp Tester Expresion Regilie): expresion regilie-la (lantre laho) analiz text ki pe rode (bwat text omilie), met tou bann korespondans ki li finn trouve ansam, ek afis zot dan bwat text rezilta.
Third-party software for use with OmegaT
Program tier pou itilizasion avek OmegaT.
This button enables you to browse and download the collections that exist for the project's source and target languages.
Kan ou klik lor sa bouton-la, ou kapav konsilt ek telesarz bann koleksion ki existe pou lang sours ek lang sib ou proze.
This chapter is intended for advanced users, who need to define their own variants of segmentation rules or devise more complex and powerful key search items.
Sa sapit-la li pou bann itilizater avanse, ki bizin definir zot prop reg segmantasion ouswa fer bann resers pli konplex ek avanse.
This collection of scripts may be useful to scripters with a knowledge of tcl/tk.
Sa koleksion skript la pou itil bann devloper ki deza ena enn konesans dan tcl/tk.
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Preferences...</g2> </m0>
Sa bwat dialog-la li aksesib depi <m0> <g1>Opsion</g1> <g2>Preferans...</g2> </m0>
This dialog lists the file filters available.
Sa bwat dialog-la donn enn lalis tou bann filt file disponib.
This enables the numerous suggestions to be managed more easily.
Sa fasilit boukou zestion bann sigzestion.
This ensures that the users' interests are protected, and has also resulted in OmegaT being awarded the <a0>Softpedia "100% FREE" guarantee</a0>.
Sa demars-la garanti proteksion lintere bann itilizater. OmegaT finn rekonpanse pou so lapros par award <a0>Softpedia "100% FREE" guarantee</a0>.
This format is the same as the tab separated one: source term, target term.
Forma-la li parey kouma separasion par tabilasion: term sours, term sib.
This hands-off approach is described by the current OmegaT project co-ordinator as "delegated anarchy".
Sa lapros non-intervansionist la finn dekrir kouma enn "lanarsi delege" par koordinater aktiel proze OmegaT.
This is described as "free as in speech", in contrast to "free as in beer".
Nou servi lopozision ant "lib" (setadir ki pena kontrint ou restriksion) ek "gratwi" (setadir ki ou pa bizin peye) pou bien fer konpran sa lide-la.
This is much the same as the above example.
Li preske parey lexanp laho la.
This is required if you would like to enter any of the meta characters !$()*+.<>?[\]^{|} to match as themselves.
Li neseser si ou bizin servi enn meta karakter swivan !$()*+.<>?[\]^{|} pou ki li match limem.
This is the <a0>recommended support channel</a0>, which users are strongly encouraged to join.
Limem <a0>kanal sipor rekomande</a0>, ek ki tou bann itilizater ankouraze servi li.
This is the main focus of the OmegaT user community.
Li mem leker kominote bann itilizater OmegaT.
This is the way text will look when displayed.
Bann text pou afise sa fason-la.
This list is for more technical discussion of features and development, and is intended for OmegaT developers and other interested parties.
Sa lalis-la li pou bann diskision teknik lor bann fonksionalite ek lor devlopman. Li destine bann devloper OmegaT ek bann dimounn interese so devlopman.
This mailing list is for localizers of OmegaT.
Mailing list pou bann lokalizater OmegaT.
This means that the source code of the OmegaT program is freely available, and that OmegaT's license gives its users considerable freedom in its use.
Savedir ki kod sours program OmegaT li aksesib par tou dimounn, ek lisans OmegaT li donn enn gran-gran liberte bann itilizater.
This option is useful for some Chinese, Japanese or Korean character input systems.
Sa lopsion-la li bien pratik pou sertin keyboard kouma Sinwa, Zapone ou Koreen.
This page allows you to choose different colours for each part of the user interface.
Sa paz-la permet ou swazir diferan kouler pou tou bann eleman interfas itilizater.
This site is also available in English!
Sit-la li ousi disponib an Kreol Morisien!
This version of the JRE will only be used locally for OmegaT, will not conflict with, override or uninstall any other JRE installations, and is therefore safe to use.
Sa metod-la pena okenn risk etan done ki OmegaT pou servi so version JRE lokalman: pa pou ena okenn konfli, ranplasman ouswa dezinstalasion sistem JRE ki deza instale.
This version will take longer to download and will require more space on your hard drive, but you can be confident that it will run.
Sa version-la pou pran plis letan pou telesarze ek pou bizin pli boukou plas lor ou hard drive, me ou kapav sir ki li pou marse.
To call up the manual from within OmegaT, simply select Help > Users manual, or press F1.
Gid-la li aksesib direkteman depi OmegaT atraver Asistans > Gid itilizater, ouswa kan ou apiy lor F1.
To check what version of the JRE, if any, is installed on your Linux system, open a console (command-line window) and type:
Pou cheke ki version JRE ou ena lor ou sistem Linux, si ou ena enn, ouver enn konsol (lafnet command-line) ek ekrir:
To edit the files and encodings a filter is used for, select the filter in the list and click <e1>Edit.</e1>
Pou sanz bann file ek lankodaz asosie avek enn filt, swazir filt-la dan lalis ek klik lor <e1>Modifie</e1>.
To enable the spell checker, select <g0>Options > Spell Checking</g0> and tick the <g1>Automatically check the spelling of text</g1> check box (see above).
Pou aktiv verifikater lortograf, klik lor <g0>Opsion > Verifikasion lortograf</g0> ek seleksionn <g1>Chek lortograf otomatikman</g1> (get laho).
To find the version most suitable for you, follow the link below to the Download Selector.
Pou trouv version ki pli adapte pou ou, chek Selekter Telesarzman atraver lien enba la.
To install spelling dictionaries, follow this procedure:
To install the necessary files for the StarDict format, proceed as follows:
Pou instal bann file StarDict neseser, ou bizin:
To obtain OpenOffice.org or LibreOffice, follow the link from "Third-party software" button on the left.
Pou telesarz OpenOffice.org ou LibreOffice, al lor paz "Program tiers" (aksesib depi meni dan gos).
To the open-source movement, the freedom that users have to change the program to suit their own needs is more important than the fact that they do not have to pay for it.
Pou mouvman open-source, sa liberte ki bann itilizater ena pou adapte enn program kouma zot oule li pli inportan ki laspe finansie, setadir laspe kot zot pa bizin peye.
To use an existing glossary, simply place it in the <f0>/glossary</f0> folder after creating the project.
Pou servi enn gloser, met li sinpleman dan dosie <f0>/glossary</f0> apre kreasion proze.
Toxic was contributed by Marc Prior.
Toxic li enn kontribision Marc Prior.
Translated files folder entered does not exist!
Dosie mansione pou bann file sib pa existe!
Dosie pour bann File Memwar Tradiksion
Translation last modified by {0} on {1} at {2}
Translation memory files folder entered does not exist!
Dosie mansione pou bann file memwar tradiksion pa existe!
Types: Exact searches match the whole search string.
Tip: Enn resers exak li pou rod exakteman seki ou finn mete dan bwat resers-la.
Unable to build new TMX file!
Inposib kree enn nouvo file TMX!
Uncheck this option if the context description shown for each glossary entry is unnecessary or too long.
Si deskripsion kontextiel ki montre pou sak lantre gloser pas neseser ouswa tro long, pa seleksionn sa lopsion-la
Uncheck this option if the glossary displays too many false positives.
Deseleksionn sa lopsion-la si gloser pe montre tro boukou fos pozitif.
Unicode (UTF-8) support: can be used with non-Latin alphabets
Zestion Unicode (UTF-8): itilizasion posib avek bann alfabe non latin

Updating a glossary file is thus rather simple: press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> and enter the new term, its translation and any comments you may have (ensuring you press tab between the fields) and save the file.

Savedir li bien sinp aktializ enn file gloser: apiy lor <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0> ek ekrir nouvo term-la, so tradiksion ek ninport ki komanter ki ou le (fer atension met enn tab ant sak lantre) ek save file-la.
Use $n to refer to the nth group.
Servi $n pou fer referans group nimero n.
Servi &Fuzzy Matching pou bann Lantre Diksioner
Servi &fuzzy matching pou bann lantre diksioner
Use Terms Appearing Separately in the Source Text
Itiliz bann term ki aparet separeman dan text sours
Use fuzzy matching for dictionary entries
Servi fuzzy matching pou lantre diksioner
Servi lematizasion pou bann lantre gloser
Use terms &appearing separately in the source text
Itiliz bann term ki &aparet separeman dan text sours
Use terms appearing separately in the source text
Itiliz bann term ki aparet separeman dan text sours
Use this feature when you have undocked, moved or hidden one or more components and you are unable to restore the desired arrangement.
Servi sa lopsion-la si ou finn detas, deplas, ou kasiet enn ouswa plizier konpozan, ek ou pa pe kapav retrouv enn laranzman satisfezan.
Use untar utility (or its equivalent, for instance<f0> winrar</f0> in Windows) to extract its contents into the project folder "Dictionary".
Servi itiliter dezarsivaz untar (ouswa enn lekivalan, par exanp <f0> winrar</f0> dan Windows) pou extrer file-la so konteni dan dosie "dictionary" proze-la.
User glossaries with recognition of inflected forms
Users are free to download and use the program.
Bann itilizater kapav telesarz ek itiliz program-la gratwitman.
Users of old computers who feel window resizing is very slow can try changing the font.
Si ou servi enn vie computer ek sanzman dimansion lafnet pran boukou letan, ou kapav sey sanz font.
Users who already have some experience with OmegaT often prefer the Latest version.
Bann itilizater ki ena lexperyans OmegaT souvan prefer dernie version.
Utility for converting Trados TagEditor (TTX) files to an intermediate format, enabling them to be translated in OmegaT.
Itiliter pou konverti bann file Trados TagEditor (TTX) dan enn format intermedier kot kapav tradir zot dan OmegaT.
Valid bann tag pou dokiman an kour
Warn: Report invalid tags to stdout.
warn: Signal bann tag non valid stdout.
We could not find the page you are looking for.
Nou pa pe kapav trouv paz ki ou pe rode.
Website support can be scripted in Groovy.
Zestion bann sit web kapav fer par bann skript Groovy.
Eski ou finn deza pans aprann?
When this option is checked, the glossary will display pairs or groups of words (expressions) even if the words within them appear separately in the source text.
Kan sa lopsion-la li seleksione, gloser pou montre bann per ouswa bann group mo (bann expresion) mem si bann mo-la aparet separeman dan text sours.
When using regular expressions, the replacement string supports references to groups defined in the search string.
Kan ou pe servi bann expresion regilie, ou kapav met bann referans dan bwat 'Ranplase par' pou bann group ki ou finn defini dan bwat 'Al rod'.
When you wish to use the filter again, just tick the check box.
Letan ou oule reservi filt-la, nek seleksionn kaz korespondan.
Where routine tasks are concerned, volunteers working on the OmegaT project are generally given as much freedom as possible in determining the form of their contribution.
Konsernan bann tas laroutinn, bann benevol ki travay lor OmegaT zot ase lib dan swa form zot kontribision.

Whether or not it is adopted depends firstly upon whether the development team considers it beneficial to OmegaT, and secondly, upon whether one of the developers is willing to do the work of implementing it.
Sipa li pou inplemante depann an premie lor apresiasion lekip devlopman par rapor so kontribision zeneral OmegaT, ek an segonn lor sipa ena enn devloper disponib pou travay lor la.
Wildcards: Both exact and keyword searches support the wildcard characters * and ?.
Joker: Bann resers exak ek par keyword zot toule de aksept bann karakter joker "*" ek "?".
Wind catches lily Scatt'ring petals to the wind: Your page is not found
Divan pe soufle Sa paz-la finn ale... Erer 404
Work with more than 30 file formats
Writeable glossary file folder entered does not exist!
Dosie mansione pou file gloser ekrivab pa existe!
X, once or not at all
X, enn sel fwa ouswa nanyen
You are also free to copy it and pass it on to other people.
Ou ousi kapav kopie li ek distribie li lezot dimounn.
You are going to modify {0} segments.
You can also call up the user manual supplied with OmegaT without launching OmegaT itself.
Ou kapav ousi lir gid litilizasion OmegaT andeor program-la.
You can also instruct the spell checker to ignore all the occurrences of the mis-spelled word, or add it to the dictionary.
Ou kapav ousi dir verifikater lortograf aret pran kont enn mo kot ena enn fot, ouswa azout li dan diksioner.

You can change the already assigned shortcuts and add new shortcuts by putting a shortcut definition file in your <a0>OmegaT</a0> preferences folder (accessible by <m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Access Configuration Folder</g3> </m1> menu).

Ou kapav sanz bann shortcut existan ouswa kree bann nouvo shortcut si ou met enn file definision shortcut dan ou dosie Preferans <a0>OmegaT</a0>(aksesib depi meni <m1> <g2>Opsion</g2> <g3>Akse Dosie Konfigirasion</g3> </m1>).

You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from.

Ouswa ou kopie bann file manielman (depi ninport ki landrwa dan ou sistem) o traver ou file manager; ouswa ou servi fonksion OmegaT <e0>"Instal enn nouvo diksioner"</e0> ki pou donn ou enn lalis diksioner disponib ki ou kapav swazir.
You can find detailed statistic information in the file: {0}
Ou kapav trouv bann linformasion statistik detaye dan file: {0}
You can go to the <a0>home page</a0> and hopefully find the information you need from there.
Ou kapav al lor <a0>homepage</a0> pou rod bann linformasion ki ou bizin.
You can have entries with the target column missing, i.e. just containing the source term and the comment.
Ou kapav fer bann lantre avek kolonn sib vid, setadir ki ena zis term sours ek komanter.
You can still find <a0>older, superseded versions</a0> of OmegaT.
Ou ankor kapav trouv <a0>bann version ansien ek version obsolet</a0> OmegaT.
You can then create an access key on the page <u0>https://term.tilde.com/account/keys/create?system=omegaT</u0>.
Apre ou pou kapav kree enn lakle lakse lor paz <u0>https://term.tilde.com/account/keys/create?system=omegaT</u0>.
You define its location and name in the project properties dialog.
Ou kapav definir file-la so lanplasman ek so nom dan bwat dialog propriyete proze-la.
You may also copy the files to your project's 'source' folder using your favorite file manager and reload the project by calling Reload from the Project menu.
Ou ousi kapav kopie bann file direkteman dan dosie "source" ou proze atraver enn file manager, ek reload ou proze depi 'Proze' > 'Reload'.
You may try to solve this problem in one of the following ways:
Ou kapav sey rezoud sa problem-la par enn sa bann solision-la:
You must enter a number between 1 and {0}.
Ou bizin sezi enn nimero ant 1 ek {0}.
You must then press <k6> <k7>Ctrl</k7> <k8>M</k8> </k6> again to insert the suggestion.
Apre ou pou bizin servi <k6> <k7>Ctrl</k7> <k8>M</k8> </k6> pou inser sigzestion-la.
You should specify their new location or recreate them.
Ou bizin mansionn zot nouvo lanplasman ouswa refer zot.
Your new shortcuts should now appear next to the menu items you have modified.
Ou nouvo shortcut pou aparet akote bann litem meni ki ou finn modifie.
Your project does not contain any files in a supported file format.
Ou proze pena okenn file dan enn format ki OmegaT kapav zere.
a through z or A through Z, inclusive (range)
a ziska z ou A ziska Z, avek (range)
and <c0><key></c0> can be any key available on your keyboard
ek <c0><key></c0> kapav ninport ki tous lor ou keyboard
comma or a period, followed by spaces and yet another comma or period
virigl ouswa pwin, swivi par lespas ek enn lot virgil ouswa pwin

lespas siplemanter apre pwin lafin lalign
greedy quantifiers will match as much as they can.
kantifikater gourman pou match otan korespondans ki zot kapav.
init <source language> <target language> Initialize a minimal team project with the specified languages.
init <lang sours> <lang sib> Kree enn proze minimal lekip avek bann lang mansione.
multiple words entries in glossaries - example
Antre plizier mo dan gloser exanp
non-greedy quantifiers will match as little as they can.
kantificater pares pou match otan tigit korespondans ki zot kapav.
search for is, not this or isn't etc.
Resers is, pas this ouswa isn't etc.
